name: Core Meltdown (sockpuppetcow)
description:
Stabilize the reactor core by completing tasks in a 3D environment. Run and jump around the core room interacting with the items the tasks specify, located on the four center consoles or on top of the rotating claw. Fill the core's stability meter to win, but if it reaches zero, it melts down and you fail.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump (double jump)
  • Mouse0 - Interact

Known issues:

  • Movement glitch when hitting the side of a platform during jump
  • Slight camera jerk when the first task is assigned

Credit:
